  • Method Details

    • getAllReviews

      @GetMapping public List<ReviewDto> getAllReviews()
      Retrieves all reviews.
      Returns:
      a list of all reviews

    • addReview

      @Secured({"ROLE_ADMIN","USER"}) @PostMapping("/items/{itemId}") public String addReview(@PathVariable Long itemId, @Valid @ModelAttribute("review") @Valid ReviewDto reviewDto, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the request for adding a review to an item. Validates the ReviewDto object, retrieves the authenticated user, and associates the review with the item and user.
      Parameters:
      itemId - the ID of the item to add the review to
      reviewDto - the ReviewDto object containing the review data
      result - the binding result for validating the form
      model - the model object for the view
      Returns:
      a redirect to the item page

    • deleteCategory

      @DeleteMapping("/delete/{reviewId}") public String deleteCategory(@PathVariable Long reviewId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the request for deleting a review. Validates the user's permission, item, and review before deleting the review.
      Parameters:
      reviewId - the ID of the review to delete
      model - the model object for the view
      Returns:
      a redirect to the item page after successful deletion, or an error page if there's an issue
